steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_team_project --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on hyperlink_team_project_test_planning --> navigate to Page_test-planning
step 5: At Page_test-planning click on hyperlink_team_project_grid --> navigate to Page_grid
step 6: At Page_grid click on hyperlink_team_project_grid_plan_job --> navigate to Page_job
step 7: At Page_job click on button_run_plan
step 8: At Page_job click on hyperlink_click_test_run_details --> navigate to Page_executions
step 9: At Page_executions click on hyperlink_team_project_test_reports_test_maintena --> navigate to Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_active
step 10: At Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_active click on hyperlink_team_project_defects --> navigate to Page_defects
step 11: Add visual checkpoint at Page_defects
